ingredients.item: 340g pack essential Waitrose Frying Steak, thinly sliced
Â½ x 25g pack fresh parsley, chopped

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the steak and onion for 3 minutes, add the mushrooms and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in the paprika and orzo and then add the stock. Cover and simmer gently for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally until the orzo is tender.
Stir in the soured cream, sprinkle over the parsley then season.
